T01n857u_001:1: śrībuddha buddhādhipa buddharūpa buddhānvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ |
T01n857u_001:2: buddhyā samastān khalu buddhaputra santoṣya yogena tu buddhameghām || 1 ||
T01n857u_001:3: śrīvajra vajrāmala jātavajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam |
T01n857u_001:4: dadan yogena tu vajrasaṃvarṣaṃ vajrātmabhāvaṃ kuruṣe suvajra || 2 ||
T01n857u_001:5: śrīratna ratnākara ratnamegha ratnena ratnaṃ ramase suratna |
T01n857u_001:8: vibodhya padmodbhava padmatoyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase supadma || 4 ||
T01n857u_001:9: śrīviśva viśvāviśa viśvajñānaṃ viśvena viśvaviṣayena lipta |
T01n857u_001:10: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvaṃ vidyāṃ suvidyāṃ sukhapācitāmiti || 5 ||
